GetProductBrandList.Statement: SELECT w2_ProductBrand.* FROM w2_ProductBrand WHERE w2_ProductBrand.valid_flg = '1'

GetProductBrand.Statement: SELECT w2_ProductBrand.* FROM w2_ProductBrand WHERE w2_ProductBrand.brand_id = @brand_id AND w2_ProductBrand.valid_flg = '1'

GetProductDefaultBrand.Statement: SELECT w2_ProductBrand.* FROM w2_ProductBrand WHERE w2_ProductBrand.default_flg = 'ON' AND w2_ProductBrand.valid_flg = '1'

GetProductBrandCount.Statement: SELECT COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM w2_ProductBrand WHERE w2_ProductBrand.valid_flg = '1'
